name: Smokin' Hot Slots - Hot Action!
description:
Smokin' Hot Slots brings Vegas & Reno Casino style to your world. This 5-reel Smokin' Hot Machine is easy to play and features tons of bonuses and high payouts.

- Features up to 30 win lines
- Many Cool Game Themes w/great casino graphics
- Daily big win bonus!
- Bonus games and bonus spins
- No internet required to play
- Facebook Connect - Sync with iPhone & iPad

Have fun and Good Luck!
